message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on a high-quality item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $8250. It's a fair compromise that still reflects the value of this unique item. What do you think?
I appreciate the compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

I understand that you're looking for a good deal, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $8000. Considering the value of the product, I'm willing to make another compromise. I can offer you the product for $7800. It's a fair price that still reflects the product's worth. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit higher on the price. Would you be willing to meet me at $7200?
